“Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.” —
Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.q: Chase your passion, not your pension.
quotes.h:
“Chase your passion, not your pension. ” —
Denis Waitley

quotes.q: Receive without complaint, Work with fate.
quotes.h:
“Receive without complaint, Work with fate.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

quotes.q: A good teacher opens the door for you, but you must enter the room by yourself.
quotes.h:
“A good teacher opens the door for you, but you must enter the room by yourself.” —
Zen Proverb

quotes.q: No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.
quotes.h:
“No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.” —
Peter A. Cohen

quotes.q: When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.
quotes.h:
“When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.q: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
quotes.h:
“I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.” —
Steve Maraboli

quotes.q: To lead the people, walk behind them.
quotes.h:
“To lead the people, walk behind them.” —
Lao Tzu

quotes.q: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
quotes.h:
“Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.” —
Henry David Thoreau

quotes.q: The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.
quotes.h:
“The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.” —
Walt Whitman

quotes.q: Get mad, then get over it.
quotes.h:
“Get mad, then get over it.” —
Colin Powell

quotes.q: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.h:
“Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.” —
W. Clement Stone

quotes.q: You are free, and that is why you are lost.
quotes.h:
“You are free, and that is why you are lost. ” —
Franz Kafka

quotes.q: It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.
quotes.h:
“It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.” —
Rumi

quotes.q: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
quotes.h:
“A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.” —
Lao Tzu

quotes.q: When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?
quotes.h:
“When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?” —
Virginia Woolf

quotes.q: The question is not what you look at, but what you see.
quotes.h:
“The question is not what you look at, but what you see.” —
Henry David Thoreau
